name: Uranium Fever
description:
Enter into the post-apocalyptic world of Uranium Fever,  where you must fight to survive! 

You play as Hazmat Guy, the lone survivor in this nuclear wasteland, and fight dozens of radiation zombies that are eager to take a bite out of you. Traverse the levels fighting off any enemy that comes your way. Increase your score by collecting chests and find all the keycards to progress through the level.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Z or Space Bar - Shoot
  • X - Potion
  • ESC- Quit
